page.title: 04St. Paul's Cray Village-home
page.content: We have carried out a survey about homes and families. 69 questionnaires were filled in. {HOMES} The majority of the people in our survey, 64%, live in houses, 30% live in bungalows, 4% live in maisonettes and 1% live in flats. Most of the houses have 5 to 9 rooms, the majority of bungalows have between 5 and 7 rooms and the only flat in our survey has 7 rooms. {FAMILIES} 87% of the families in our survey have 2 adults, 7% have 1 adult, 4% have 3 adults and 1% have 4 adults. We also studied children and found that 46% of the families in our survey have 1 boy, 33% have 2, 6% have 3 and 15% have no boys. 48% of the families have 1 girl, 23% have 2 and 28% have no girls. There are 90 boys and 65 girls in our survey. The largest number of children in one family is 4.
